name: Clothing Rental: Costumes, Uniforms, and Formal Wear
tcc: R for face-to-face transactions.\nT for nonâ€“face-to-face transactions.
description:
Retailers that rent costumes, uniforms, formal wear, tuxedos, and
other types of apparel and related accessories.
For wholesale distributors that sell or rent uniforms to other
businesses, use MCC 5137.
